name: resume
description: ``` npx --yes onchange --initial site -- node site/build.js npx serve docs ```

scripts.site:dev:watch: npx --yes onchange --initial site -- npm run site:build
scripts.site:dev: npx --yes stmux -- [ [ "npm run site:dev:watch" ] : [ --size 1/3 "npm run site:dev:serve:local" .. "npm run site:dev:serve:public" ] ]
